Jigar Patel wrote:
> Hey, One more thing I want to know from you guys...
>    
>   If want FRAME link as well..
>    
>   I did,  treat-frames-as-embed-links: True
>    
>   But I want only frame Embed links, means no other link having E in discovery path except frames...

I agree it would be useful to distinguish most FRAME SRC 'E' hops 
(mostly HTML) from IMG SRC, SCRIPT SRC, and LINK REL="stylesheet" 'E" 
hops (non-HTML)... but unfortunately, it's not currently possible 
without writing your own custom DecideRule.

- Gordon @ IA
